name: 3 Skulls of the Toltecs
description:
Saddle up and mosey on into town for one of the most challenging, hilarious and exciting adventures this side of Texas!

The treasures of the Toltecs are within your reach - riches beyond your wildest dreams. But first you must locate the 3 skulls ... and believe me - it ain't that easy. You must travel through wild west locations and encounter a host of characters including the good, the bad and the downright ugly!
